title: Anchorage Digital secures $100m Tether investment
snippet: Anchorage Digital, America’s first federally chartered crypto bank for innovators and investors, today announced a $100 million strategic equity investment from Tether, the largest company in the digital asset ecosystem.

title: Kraken Institutional launches first managed crypto yield strategy with Bitwise
snippet: The Bitwise-managed strategy seeks to generate income from otherwise idle crypto holdings while assets remain within Kraken's custody.

title: Tether USDt hits record $187B market cap in Q4 despite crypto downturn
snippet: USDt added $12.4 billion in Q4 to reach a $187.3 billion market cap, increasing users and onchain activity even as rival stablecoins declined after October’s liquidation event.

title: Tether USDT posts record user growth in Q4 despite crypto market shock
snippet: Tether's total reserves also grew by $11.7 billion during the quarter to $192.9 billion, including 96,184 BTC.

title: Multiliquid, Metalayer launch instant redemption backstop for RWAs on Solana
snippet: The new facility allows institutions to redeem tokenized real-world assets into stablecoins instantly, addressing a key liquidity bottleneck in onchain markets.

title: Tokenization firms warn EU DLT pilot constraints risk pushing markets to the US
